channel.title: Allstar Reborn
channel.description:
[center] [size=18pt]THERE IS A LOT MORE THAN I MENTIONED LIKE WORKING DIALOGUE ETC ETC[/size] Well.. I'm not going to be messing with this anymore. So I thought I'd release it. Okay so this source is Allstar based and it's very good [b]FOR AN ALLSTAR SOURCE[/b]
[size=16pt]Info:[/size] I did a stress test and it took 130 players to take it down (not good at all :l) 272KB Client.java TPC Removed(ThreadPerClient) Lots of code done more efficiently (and some done horribly) etc etc... Cba to list everything here. This is very different from the original source.
Notes: Tiny anti leech because I edited Config & Server.java All the objects you need are already being made (all at coords 1 1) This isn't a good source. (No Allstar I can think of is)
Credits: Graham Edgecombe All of the original developers of allstarscape tutorials & snippets people who helped me Arham 4 because he's cool Me because I cleaned so much shit out and moved code to other classes and improved stability and fixed dupes and yeah I did quite a lot xD
Cba to take any media either(none of it's on my comp sorry)
The rar file is attached. There's no client but I think you can use any client that would work with a regular Allstar.

someone please, help me fixing this anti leech

item.title: Allstar Reborn
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:49, topic:513612”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=631858.msg4303803#msg4303803 date=1369441550]

I can easily find a cleaner allstar source and if I couldn’t then clean the bitch myself if I had to…
as for the stablility you’ve stated that you increased it but what updates did you actually do and what core updates have you done.
And for being ‘easier to work with’…I don’t really care about that…but for new coders and shit like that then good job I guess for making it more noob-friendly.

It was already noob-friendly cough

Just sayin’
[/quote]yes cause a 50000kb client class is such a noob friendly…[/quote]

lul my client.java is biggr then urs

Probably smaller than 99.9% of Allstars.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar Reborn
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“Togasa, post:46, topic:513612”]I can easily find a cleaner allstar source and if I couldn’t then clean the bitch myself if I had to…
as for the stablility you’ve stated that you increased it but what updates did you actually do and what core updates have you done.
And for being ‘easier to work with’…I don’t really care about that…but for new coders and shit like that then good job I guess for making it more noob-friendly.[/quote]

The only Allstar that’s better I can think of is Echo v1.
And I can’t name everything I did to the core(I’d need to type a lot of stuff), but I did a lot. Look through the source my friend.
Also, you should care about it being easier to work with. If you have something typed 5000 times do you want to change it 5000 times or 1 time? (Config.java took care of that with the Servername etc)

Read full topic

Stabler
